definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: We determined an outcome-drien reference frame for ABP measurement.
sentences.chinese: 我們確定一個結果爲嚮導的參照系測量動態血壓。

sentences.english: Its content and reference frame varies in different ages, directly impacting the content and form of historical compilation with different features of era.
sentences.chinese: 然而其內容和參照系，卻因時代不同而表現互異。

sentences.english: Answer: Bias is inside the Reference System.
sentences.chinese: 偏執就偏在參照系裏面。

sentences.english: Answer: It will be like this if the Reference System is really broken.
sentences.chinese: 如果真正能夠打破了參照系，那就是這個樣子。

sentences.english: We determined an outcome-driven reference frame for ABP measurement.
sentences.chinese: 我們確定一個結果爲嚮導的參照系測量動態血壓。

sentences.english: The measuring pattern is the content of the Reference System.
sentences.chinese: 這個衡量模式就是參照系的內容。

sentences.english: There exists in the cosmos a preferred frame of reference.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙中有一個從優參照系。

sentences.english: Quasars are so far away that they constitute the best frame of reference for measuring Earth’s rotation rate.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，類星體是測量地球自轉最好的參照系。

sentences.english: The earth rotates and moves around the sun , so it is a non - inertial reference system - .
sentences.chinese: 地球既有自轉又有公轉，所以是非慣性參照系。

sentences.english: Having these paranormal capacities doesn't mean the Reference System has changed.
sentences.chinese: 有了這些超常功能不等於參照系變了。

sentences.english: Usually, the reference frame is the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 通常這個參照系就是地球。
